members.name: AudioListener.positionX
members.description: Represents the horizontal position of the listener in a right-hand cartesian coordinate sytem. The default is 0.

members.name: AudioListener.positionY
members.description: Represents the vertical position of the listener in a right-hand cartesian coordinate sytem. The default is 0.

members.name: AudioListener.positionZ
members.description: Represents the longitudinal (back and forth) position of the listener in a right-hand cartesian coordinate sytem. The default is 0.

members.name: AudioListener.forwardX
members.description: Represents the horizontal position of the listener's forward direction in the same cartesian coordinate sytem as the position (positionX, positionY, and positionZ) values. The forward and up values are linearly independent of each other. The default is 0.

members.name: AudioListener.forwardY
members.description: Represents the vertical position of the listener's forward direction in the same cartesian coordinate sytem as the position (positionX, positionY, and positionZ) values. The forward and up values are linearly independent of each other. The default is 0.

members.name: AudioListener.forwardZ
members.description: Represents the longitudinal (back and forth) position of the listener's forward direction in the same cartesian coordinate sytem as the position (positionX, positionY, and positionZ) values. The forward and up values are linearly independent of each other. The default is -1.

members.name: AudioListener.upX
members.description: Represents the horizontal position of the top of the listener's head in the same cartesian coordinate sytem as the position (positionX, positionY, and positionZ) values. The forward and up values are linearly independent of each other. The default is 0.

members.name: AudioListener.upY
members.description: Represents the vertical position of the top of the listener's head in the same cartesian coordinate sytem as the position (positionX, positionY, and positionZ) values. The forward and up values are linearly independent of each other. The default is 1.

members.name: AudioListener.upZ
members.description: Represents the longitudinal (back and forth) position of the top of the listener's head in the same cartesian coordinate sytem as the position (positionX, positionY, and positionZ) values. The forward and up values are linearly independent of each other. The default is 0.

members.name: AudioListener.setOrientation()
members.description: Sets the orientation of the listener.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x value of the front vector of the listener.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y value of the front vector of the listener.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: The z value of the front vector of the listener.

parameters.name: xUp
parameters.description: The x value of the up vector of the listener.

parameters.name: yUp
parameters.description: The y value of the up vector of the listener.

parameters.name: zUp
parameters.description: The z value of the up vector of the listener.

members.name: AudioListener.setPosition()
members.description: Sets the position of the listener. See Deprecated features to learn why this method was removed.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x position of the listener in 3D space.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y position of the listener in 3D space.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: The z position of the listener in 3D space.

members.name: AudioListener.dopplerFactor
members.description: A double value representing the amount of pitch shift to use when rendering a doppler effect.

members.name: AudioListener.speedOfSound
members.description: Is a double value representing the speed of sound, in meters per second.
